preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh 30 g of boron (B), 90 g of erbium (Er), and 60 g of selenium (Se) using an analytical balance. 
 2. In a clean, dry glass container, combine the weighed amounts of B, Er, and Se. 
 3. Use a pestle and mortar to thoroughly mix the powders until a uniform blend is achieved.
